categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic companies

nodes.text: Excelsior Company was a unit of the Grand Army of the Republic. During the Clone Wars, Excelsior Company specialized in SAR (search and rescue) and due to this, all members of the company had at least basic medical training. The company donned armor with orange markings.

During the war, the company was sent under the command of Clone Commander Vargus to investigate the disappearance of the 313th Legion on Ando Prime. It included 16, 18 "Ace", 23, 35, 36, 44 "Slug", 57 "Patch", and some variables like Falco, Splice, and Dom "Bruiser".
